entry.title: Vite report on Mon, 21 Aug 2023 16:01:06
entry.summary:
Tech:
- How to implement attribute routing in Asp.net MVC?
- How can Scala and Kotlin interact to build user-friendly DSLs?
- Uncovering GAPS: a 3D experience map to identify and solve consumer problems with XR
- A guide for successful client assessments and discoveries
- SOLID Principles: How to create a code that is easy to extend and maintain
- Authentication sidecar — a new experience in microservice architecture
- Build, Deploy, and Host Your Vite App on GitHub Pages with GitHub Actions CI/CD
- Threads to launch web version, one of its largest updates yet
- Changing its name tanked X's downloads in App Store and Play Store

Business:
- Why your team design is slowing your business down - and what to do about it
- Here's how government can accelerate their digital journey and empower citizens
- How to deal with the five dysfunctions of a team?
- How to select a Payment Gateway: Functions of Payment Gateways
- Why don’t women ask? Bridging the gender pay gap

AI:
- How can Scala and Kotlin interact to build user-friendly DSLs?
- Authentication sidecar — a new experience in microservice architecture

Other:
- The year of 'global boiling' is creating an opportunity for winemakers in Sweden
- Russia's so desperate to get its billionaires and their massive wealth back
- There's still a Sriracha shortage and third-party vendors are selling the sauce for up to $23 on Amazon
- A glitch temporarily wiped out X images and links between 2011 and 2014
- Tiger Woods' 'little brother' Justin Thomas sells his $3.5 million 'starter' mansion and it's the ultimate bachelor pad
- My talk with Kris Nova about being homeless. See you on the other side, friend
- Today’s Wordle #793 Hints, Clues And Answer For Monday, August 21st
- Cell therapy repairs cornea damage with patient's stem cells gives trial results

Insights:
- The tech section focuses on topics such as web development, DSLs, and microservice architecture.
- The business section discusses team design, government digitalization, and payment gateways.
- The AI section explores the intersection of Scala, Kotlin, and user-friendly DSLs.
- The other section covers various topics including global warming's impact on winemaking, wealth redistribution, food shortages, and personal stories.
- Overall, the report highlights the diverse range of topics in the provided content, showcasing the intersection of technology, business, and societal issues.
